recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.method: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.  2. In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.  3. Add onion and garlic to skillet and cook until onion is translucent.  4. Add crushed tomatoes, salt, and pepper and bring to a simmer.  5. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.method: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.  2. Season chicken with salt and pepper.  3. Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.  4. Slice lettuce, cucumber, and tomato and place in a bowl.  5. In a separate bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.  6. Pour dressing over salad and toss to combine.  7. Top salad with grilled chicken.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F.  2. In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar.  3. Beat in egg and vanilla.  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.  5. Gradually mix dry ingredients into butter mixture.  6. Stir in chocolate chips.  7. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets.  8. Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly browned.  9. Cool on wire racks.

recipes.name: Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
recipes.method: 1. Preheat grill to high heat.  2. Rub steaks with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.  3. Grill steaks for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.  4. Let steaks rest for 5 minutes before slicing.  5. In a food processor, pulse parsley and garlic until finely chopped.  6. Add red wine vinegar, olive oil, red pepper flakes, and a pinch of salt and pulse until well combined.  7. Serve chimichurri sauce over sliced steak.

recipes.name: Roasted Brussel Sprouts
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F.  2. Trim and halve brussel sprouts.  3. Toss brussel sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.  4. Arrange brussel sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet.  5. Roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and browned.  6. While still hot, toss brussel sprouts with minced garlic and grated parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F.  2. Place pie crust in a 9-inch pie dish.  3. In a large bowl, combine apples, white sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, cornstarch, and lemon juice.  4. Pour apple mixture into pie crust.  5. Dot with butter.  6. Roll out remaining pie crust and cut into strips.  7. Arrange strips in a lattice pattern over the top of the pie.  8. Beat egg with water and brush over lattice crust.  9. Sprinkle with coarse sugar.  10. Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until crust is golden brown.

recipes.name: Fried Chicken
recipes.method: 1. In a large bowl, whisk together buttermilk, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.  2. Add chicken drumsticks and coat evenly in the buttermilk mixture.  3. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight.  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and black pepper.  5. Remove chicken from buttermilk mixture and dredge in the flour mixture, shaking off any excess.  6. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.  7. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through.  8. Drain chicken on paper towels and serve hot.

recipes.name: Grilled Shrimp Skewers
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.method: 1. Preheat grill to high heat.  2. Thread shrimp onto skewers.  3. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, salt, black pepper, cilantro, garlic, honey, and lime juice.  4. Brush the shrimp skewers with the marinade.  5. Grill shrimp skewers for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.  6. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
recipes.method: 1. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.  2. Add beef and cook until browned on all sides.  3. Remove beef from skillet and set aside.  4. In the same skillet, sauté onion and garlic until translucent.  5. Add sliced mushrooms and sauté until tender.  6. Stir in beef broth, sour cream, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, paprika, nutmeg, salt, and black pepper.  7. Add beef back to the skillet and simmer for 10-15 minutes.  8. Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.name: Beef Bourguignon
ingredients: 2 lbs beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F.  2. In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.  3. Dredge beef cubes in the flour mixture, shaking off any excess.  4. In a large Dutch oven, heat butter over medium-high heat.  5. Add bacon and cook until crispy.  6. Remove bacon from the Dutch oven and set aside.  7. Add beef to the Dutch oven and cook until browned on all sides.  8. Remove beef from the Dutch oven and set aside.  9. Add onions, carrots, celery, and garlic to the Dutch oven and sauté until vegetables are tender.  10. Stir in red wine, beef broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaves.  11. Add beef and bacon back to the Dutch oven and bring to a simmer.  12. Cover the Dutch oven and transfer to the oven.  13. Bake for 2 1/2 to 3 hours, or until beef is tender.  14. Add potatoes and mushrooms to the Dutch oven and bake for an additional 30 minutes.  15. Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.

recipes.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
ingredients: 2 lbs beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F.  2. In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.  3. Dredge beef cubes in the flour mixture, shaking off any excess.  4. In a large Dutch oven, heat butter over medium-high heat.  5. Add bacon and cook until crispy.  6. Remove bacon from the Dutch oven and set aside.  7. Add beef to the Dutch oven and cook until browned on all sides.  8. Remove beef from the Dutch oven and set aside.  9. Add onions, carrots, celery, and garlic to the Dutch oven and sauté until vegetables are tender.  10. Stirin red wine, beef broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaves.  11. Add beef and bacon back to the Dutch oven and bring to a simmer.  12. Cover the Dutch oven and transfer to the oven.  13. Bake for 2 1/2 to 3 hours, or until beef is tender.  14. Add potatoes and mushrooms to the Dutch oven and bake for an additional 30 minutes.  15. Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.

recipes.name: Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs), cut into pieces
recipes.method: 1. In a large Dutch oven, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.  2. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.  3. Remove chicken from the Dutch oven and set aside.  4. Add onion, celery, carrots, and garlic to the Dutch oven and sauté until vegetables are tender.  5. Return chicken to the Dutch oven and add chicken broth, salt, pepper, and bay leaf.  6. Bring to a simmer and cook for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.  7. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a medium bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and salt.  8. Add melted butter and milk and stir until a sticky dough forms.  9. Drop spoonfuls of the dough onto the simmering chicken mixture.  10. Cover the Dutch oven and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through.  11. Serve hot.
